Uses of Package
ca.mcgill.ecse211.model

  • Packages that use ca.mcgill.ecse211.model 
    Package Description
    ca.mcgill.ecse211.main  
    ca.mcgill.ecse211.model  
  • Classes in ca.mcgill.ecse211.model used by ca.mcgill.ecse211.main 
    Class and Description
    OdometerExceptions
    This class is used to handle errors regarding the singleton pattern used for the odometer and odometerData
  • Classes in ca.mcgill.ecse211.model used by ca.mcgill.ecse211.model 
    Class and Description
    AssessCanColor
    This class allows the robot to correctly identify a can's color by taking the mode of many samples.
    AssessCanWeight
    This class allows the robot to correctly identify a can's weight by using the touch sensor.
    Clamp
    This class is responsible for driving the clamp motor to load and unload the can.
    ColorClassification
    This class implements color classification to identify the color of the cans.
    LightLocalizer
    This class handles the light localization of the robot.
    Navigation
    This class contains all the methods that contribute to making the robot move.
    Odometer
    This class deals with keeping track of the robot's position (i.e., the odometer) It extends the OdometerData class and implements the Runnable interface
    OdometerData
    This class stores and provides thread safe access to the odometer data.
    OdometerExceptions
    This class is used to handle errors regarding the singleton pattern used for the odometer and odometerData
    Robot
    This class contains the methods that directly handle the game parameters retrieved from the game server.
